author: Staff Reporter
text:
In addition to the toll free complaint number launched by the district administration, residents of the city could also lodge complaints on the model code of conduct violation and other violations or irregularities of political parties by sending a message to the newly launched Whatsapp complaint number ‘8190000100’.

City Police Commissioner A. Amalraj said that people could call the police control room at ‘100’ to lodge complaints. “These complaints will be passed on to the police stations concerned to initiate action.

A separate incident register will be maintained at all the police stations to keep track of all the election related complaints,” he said.

More than 120 police personnel have been deployed in the various elections related surveillance teams in the four assembly constituencies in the city limits.

They will be deployed in three shifts of eight hours each.
title: Inform police through Whatsapp
